metadata.title: CVE-2022-1486 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 101.0.4951.41 allowed aremote attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from processmemory via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
